item.name: {HOST.NAME} alarm entry added
item.description: This trap is sent each time an alarm is inserted into to the alarm table. It is sent on the insertion of all alarms except for upsAlarmOnBattery and upsAlarmTestInProgress.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} alarm entry removed
item.description: This trap is sent each time an alarm is removed from the alarm table. It is sent on the removal of all alarms except for upsAlarmTestInProgress.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} battery low
item.description: SEVERE: Battery is near to be discharged.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} battery test failed
item.description: SEVERE: UPS failed the last test of battery.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} imminent stop
item.description: SEVERE: The UPS is near to switch off the output power.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} output is on Battery
item.description: The UPS is operating on battery power. This trap is persistent and is resent at one minute intervals until the UPS either turns off or is no longer running on battery.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} est sur batterie
item.description: WARNING: The UPS has switched to battery backup power.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} output is on mains
item.description: SEVERE: The UPS output is on mains.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} overloading
item.description: SEVERE: The UPS has sensed a load greater than 100 percent of its rated capacity.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} temperature higher than its limit
item.description: SEVERE: The UPS has sensed a temperature greater than its limit.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} : Power restored
item.description: INFORMATION: Input power has been restored.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} test completed
item.description: This trap is sent upon completion of a UPS diagnostic test.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} status is normal
item.description: INFORMATION: The UPS status is normal.

item.name: {HOST.NAME} turned off
item.description: WARNING: The UPS has been turned off by the management station.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} alarm entry added
trigger.description: This trap is sent each time an alarm is inserted into to the alarm table. It is sent on the insertion of all alarms except for upsAlarmOnBattery and upsAlarmTestInProgress.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} alarm entry removed
trigger.description: This trap is sent each time an alarm is removed from the alarm table. It is sent on the removal of all alarms except for upsAlarmTestInProgress.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} battery low
trigger.description: SEVERE: Battery is near to be discharged.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} battery test failed
trigger.description: SEVERE: UPS failed the last test of battery.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} imminent stop
trigger.description: SEVERE: The UPS is near to switch off the output power.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} is overloading
trigger.description: SEVERE: The UPS has sensed a load greater than 100 percent of its rated capacity.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} output is on Battery
trigger.description: The UPS is operating on battery power. This trap is persistent and is resent at one minute intervals until the UPS either turns off or is no longer running on battery.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} output is on mains
trigger.description: SEVERE: The UPS output is on mains.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Power has been restored
trigger.description: INFORMATION: Input power has been restored.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} status is normal
trigger.description: INFORMATION: The UPS status is normal.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} switched to battery backup power
trigger.description: WARNING: The UPS has switched to battery backup power.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} temperature higher than its limit
trigger.description: SEVERE: The UPS has sensed a temperature greater than its limit.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} test completed
trigger.description: This trap is sent upon completion of a UPS diagnostic test.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} turned off
trigger.description: WARNING: The UPS has been turned off by the management station.
